medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented to the ED with one day of right upper quadrant pain, which began after being discharged from a previous ED visit for gastroenteritis without abdominal pain. She reports that the pain has persisted and become more severe throughout the day, prompting her return to the ED. She denies nausea or vomiting today and reports normal bowel movements until yesterday.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with CAD; daughter died of renal cell cancer; son with hydrocephalus and mental retardation since birth
